attributes.action: More checks and regulations on the content posted on social media.
attributes.additional_details:
The use of social media in modern day society is growing and the amount of cyber bullying and abuse is an increasing concern amoung us.

I propose that the government checks through posts and messages on social media websites and immediately makes sure that anything that can be seen as racist, sexist, homophobic, insulting or offensive in any othe way is removed, the responsible account is shut down and offender is banned from social media for life.

This will help prevent a lot of upset and pain that is caused by social media websites. It will also ensure that not only younger users of the websites are protected from abuse and possibly exploitation but everyone who uses social media in the correct way.

Please join me in my fight against cyber crime because it is so important that social media is used in a safe way and is not used a weapon against people.
